mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def find_ed_words(paragraph):
    cleaned_paragraph = re.sub('', '', paragraph.lower())
    matches = re.findall('\\b\\w*ed\\w+\\b', cleaned_paragraph)
    word_counts = Counter(matches)
    sorted_word_counts = sorted(word_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_word_counts

import re
from collections import Counter

def find_ed_words(paragraph):
    cleaned_paragraph = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', paragraph.lower())
    matches = re.findall('\\b\\w*ed\\w+\\b', cleaned_paragraph)
    word_counts = Counter(matches)
    sorted_word_counts = sorted(word_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_word_counts

mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def find_ed_words(paragraph):
    cleaned_paragraph = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', paragraph.lower())
    matches = re.findall('\\b\\w*ed\\w+\\b', cleaned_paragraph)
    word_counts = Counter(matches)
    sorted_word_counts = sorted(word_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[-1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_word_counts
